title: Crysis99
author: Crysis99
content: Hello,we have founded a WLH Casino with a Curacao e-gaming license and are looking for investors/silent partners to allocate the last 6% company shares, whereby you can already purchase from 0.1%Here are some key data about the project:- E-gaming licensed online casino (Curacao license)- Softswiss is the provider (market leader in the gambling sector) which also includes e.g. stakes- We have already bought the domain (website).- The design is fixed- Over 1000 games from the top manufacturers will be playable on the site- All usual payment methods as well as crypto payments are integrated- Currently the team has pledged €350,000 just for the licences, the site, the games etc, and collateral, bankroll etc- 21 Current Investors- Currently everything is integrated & programmed takes about 1.5 months including testingThe team consists of 4 young (24-29 years) entrepreneurs who all work in different industries. However, the CEO has experience in gambling as a casino owner for 5 years and therefore also has the licenses to operate a casino, the others own real estate or are active in the IT industry.In the zoom call we will show you the following points:licensecompany excerptprovider contractbusiness planSWOT analysis5 year plansales developmentYou are interested? Would you like to find out more?Then do not hesitate to contact me!For data protection reasons, I am not allowed to publicly mention the name of the casino from the provider. In the zoom call, however, we will of course also show you the design and name.I look forward to hearing from you!

comments.author: shasan
comments.created_time: June 25, 2022, 11:47:23 PMLast edit: June 26, 2022, 02:58:35 PM by shasan
comments.body: Would you like to share more information specially contact information. For example can you please share the link of the website, email address, social media profile link, contact information, contact address and so on so that we can know more about the project. Without proper analysis there is no reason to invest on a project.

comments.author: Maasdamer
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on June 25, 2022, 11:47:23 PMWould you like to share more information specially contact information. For example can you please share the link of the website, email address, social media profile link, contact information, contact address and so on so that we can know more about the project. Without proper analysis there is no reason to invest on a project.You can read right? "For data protection reasons, I am not allowed to publicly mention the name of the casino from the provider. In the zoom call, however, we will of course also show you the design and name."If you are "interested", what you are clearly not, you just want to waste somebodies time, you can schedule a call with the OP,  as he stated.

comments.author: K5rL4n
comments.body: Can you message me too? (Like ndumm, since I'm a newbie, I'm unable to private message you.)

comments.author: RACToriginal
comments.body: Best place to ask for investersThe Internet

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: In fact, there is very little information about the campaign that is looking for investors, there is not even a website and email to understand what it is, there are only intentions, I think it will be so hard to find interested investors.

comments.author: vviser
comments.body: I recently went to play on Fairspin and noticed that there’s an active tournament for $200k. Judging by the name “Winter Vs Summer”, I assume you can win a trip to a cold or a warm climate country, is that so?
